title: Spike Feresten
description:
Spike Feresten is the host of the 'Spikes Car Radio' Podcast, as well and a career producer, writer, and television host. Perhaps best known for writing some of the most iconic episodes of the show Seinfeld. He knows Porsches, Watches, and making fun of Matt.

Meats! https://www.butcherbox.com/tire

Watches! https://www.crownandcaliber.com/tst

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/vOfpV3p2dGI

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @spikeferesten

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @spikeferesten
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
